newsitem.title: USA: Cornell Corrections boosts number of IPO shares.
newsitem.headline: Cornell Corrections boosts number of IPO shares.

text.p: Cornell Corrections has increased the number of shares to be offered in its proposed initial public offering to four million, a spokesman for underwriter Dillon Read & Co said on Friday.
Cornell previously planned to offer 3.5 million shares. The estimated price range of $11 to $13 remains the same.
The IPO is expected in early October, he said.
